about.title: About
about.text: I am Alexis Germain, a passionate web developer specializing in creating modern and interactive web experiences. With expertise in Vue/Nuxt and React/Next, I design high-performance interfaces, integrating animations with Framer Motion & GSAP, 3D with Three.js, and paying close attention to detail.

about.title: ABOUT
about.intro: Freelance Web Developer based in Bruyères-sur-Oise, I design and develop showcase websites, ensure maintenance and optimization of existing sites, and integrate customized solutions to meet specific needs.

description.1: Design and development of showcase websites.
description.2: Maintenance and optimization of existing sites.
description.3: Integration of customized solutions to meet specific needs.
description.4: Technical support and training to ensure client autonomy.

description.1: Design, development, management and maintenance of French websites.
description.2: International collaboration: coordination with ASUS Europe and implementation of technical fixes via Jira, in connection with Taiwan.
description.3: Support and translation: adaptation of marketing content in French and technical assistance for European campaigns.
description.4: Participation in marketing meetings: contribution to digital strategies and integration of marketing initiatives on web platforms.
